Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran was fined 15 per cent of his match fee for publicly criticising the umpires during the second T20I against India.
Pooran's criticism occurred following the review of an LBW decision in the fourth over of the India innings.
West Indies won the match with seven balls to spare, taking a 2-0 lead in the five-match series.
Nicholas Pooran scored 67 runs off 40 balls, leading West Indies to victory.
